title: Draft Statement of Work (SOW)
description: Following a successful discovery phase, a consultant needs to draft an SOW for a standard implementation project.

tasks.description: Select the appropriate SOW template for a 'Standard Implementation'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant chooses the correct template from the document library.

tasks.description: Fill in the SOW with the customer's details, project scope, timeline, and cost, based on the discovery document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant creates a detailed and accurate SOW.

tasks.description: Send the draft SOW to the customer for review and signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant sends the SOW to the customer.
